sentences.en: A national Athenian spirit at last began to overtake tribal loyalties.
sentences.cn: 雅典的民族精神,也最终超越了忠于部落的境界.

sentences.en: For no man knows what misfortunes may overtake you.
sentences.cn: 因为谁都不知道你会遭到什么不幸.

sentences.en: He pulled out to overtake a truck.
sentences.cn: 他驶出车流，以超过一辆卡车。

sentences.en: He pulled out to overtake the van.
sentences.cn: 他把车驶出所在车道想超过那辆小货车。

sentences.en: He was about to pull out to overtake the guy in front of him.
sentences.cn: 他正要驶离车流超前面那人的车。

sentences.en: I had to walk very fast to overtake you.
sentences.cn: 我不得不快走才能赶过你.

sentences.en: I went to overtake him on the back straight on the last lap.
sentences.cn: 最后一圈时我在非终点直道上超过了他。

sentences.en: It is dangerous to overtake at a corner.
It's dangerous to overtake on a bend.
sentences.cn: 在转弯处超车十分危险.

sentences.en: Never attempt to overtake on the crest of a hill.
sentences.cn: 在坡顶绝不要企图超车.

sentences.en: Never try to overtake on a bend.
Pulling out to overtake, the car collided head-on with a van.
sentences.cn: 越线超车时，轿车和一辆厢式货车迎面相撞。

sentences.en: She put on an impressive turn of speed to overtake the others.
sentences.cn: 她突然奋勇加速力图超过别人.
一种恐慌的感觉袭裹了我。

sentences.en: The red car was pulling out ready to overtake.
sentences.cn: 那辆红色汽车驶离车列准备超车。

sentences.en: Tragedy was shortly to overtake him, however.
sentences.cn: 然而，不幸将很快降临到他的头上。

sentences.en: We know instinctively, just as beekeepers with their bees that misfortune might overtake us if the important events of our lives were not related to it.
sentences.cn: 我们本能地懂得, 正如养蜂人对待蜜蜂一样,如果不把我们生活中的重大事件告诉这条河,我们就会遭到厄运的袭击.

sentences.en: We know instinctively, just as bookeepers with their bees that misfortune might overtake us if the important events of our lives were not related to it.
sentences.cn: 正如养蜂人与蜜蜂的关系一样,我们本能地懂得如果我们不把自己生活中重大事件告诉它的话,不幸的事情就会袭击我们.

trans.tran_cn: 超过，赶上，（不愉快的事情）突然发生，（使）难以承受
trans.tran_en: to go past a moving vehicle or person because you are going faster than them and want to get in front of them

trans.tran_cn: 追上， 超过； 突然降临于， 意外地碰上
trans.tran_en: to go past a moving vehicle or person because you are going faster than them and want to get in front of them
